pullRequest.title: CAMEL-14646: [camel-azure] Add the possibility to set credentials as …

nodes.bodyText: can we introduce another check if either credentialsAccountKey or credentialsAccountName is null and perhaps throw an error if creds and one of the credentialsAccountKey or credentialsAccountName are null?

nodes.bodyText: Maybe it would be better to remove these messages to the component class or util class and keep configuration class for configuration related stuff?
